content.p: Careers in this sector, also known as built environment, range from civil and building services engineering, surveying or planning, through to those with a strong commercial focus like property management and valuation. The usual route into the sector is a recognised professional qualification, sometimes offered as a postgraduate conversion. If you have questions about your plans, talk to a member of our team.
